name: godmode
description: AI-powered development workflow with Agent Teams. 7 workflow commands, 29 skill packages, 24 agents (16 review + 4 research + 3 team + 1 product), Agent Teams integration with defined implementation team roles (Lead, Analyst, Implementer) and autodetection-based routing, autonomous development loops, per-project review configuration, product planning (roadmap + backlog), document quality review, knowledge compounding, and structured phases for planning, execution, and finalization.
